snippet: Mano a Mano will hold a tasting of food from a variety of Mexican restaurants, a pizza party will be held to benefit City Harvest and more.
lead_paragraph: Mano a Mano will hold a tasting of food from a variety of Mexican restaurants, a pizza party will be held to benefit City Harvest and more.

headline.seo: Mano a Mano Holds a Mexican Food Tasting, a Pizza Party to Benefit City Harvest and More
